game_description: Dead and Buried II is a fast-paced multiplayer shooter set in a supernatural western world. Grab your six-shooters and choose from multiple gamemodes. Compete against real players online to see who the best gunslinger is or play cooperatively versus the undead horde! The game is a sequel to the popular Dead and Buried released on Rift and GO. Features: - Competitive Modes: battle online in free-roaming Deathmatch or cover-based Shootout. - Cooperative Modes: band together in free-roaming Survival or stationary Horde. - Duel it out: Go 1v1 in a last-man-standing Quickdraw match. - Multiplayer Bots: never wait for players again! Bots will fill the game. - Portable: with Quest, take the action on the go. - Social: make new friends in the Town and spin up matches together. - Weaponry: six-shooters, grenade launchers, and more!
Languages: English, French (France), German, Japanese, Korean, Spanish (Mexico)

review_2: I miss the old dead and buried one the zombies was simple and the multiplayer was relaxing but I feel like all of that has changed. There is now team death match that feels nothing like the old game. They even messed up the zombies. I miss just sitting somewhere and shooting them but not all running around. They just have to learn the simple is great even sometimes better
review_3: This game was the best but after 3 years I play this game but there was no players I played this game on my oculus rift and it is sad to see this game have no updates no player you will be missed ü´°‚òπÔ∏è
review_4: Love the game great graphics waste many hours playing it . As a result I see many glitches and disconnects . Hope they fix it soon then I would rate a 5!
review_5: I love this game, especially the shootout, deathmatch makes me nauseous. Developers need to fix the ability to cheat. So many people are hiding behind stuff and reaching their arms THROUGH the virtual solid objects like barrels, walls, and beams.....even some of the bots do it. You can sometimes see their faces peek through the object also. This needs to be made not possible as it makes it impossible to kill the cheaters. Everyone should have to shoot around and over objects. The way it is now makes it not fun anymore as more players are hip to this cheating glitch and are destroying honest players. Please.fix it!! Also please fix the issue with the invisible bots!!
